components.name: Verify

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Smart Network in Philippines

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Smart Network in Philippines. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Smart Network in Philippines. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Smart Network in Philippines. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to America Net Network in Brazil

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Failures From Twilio Mexican Long Codes to AT&T Network in Mexico

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery failures when sending messages from Twilio Mexican Long Codes to the AT&T network in Mexico for non-OTP messages and OTP messages containing a subset of UCS2 characters. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Message Status Update Failures Affecting MMS Messages for a Subset of Customers

incident_updates.body: Our engineers have identified the issue causing MMS message status update failures with Programmable Messaging for a subset of customers and are still working to deploy a fix. Well provide an update on 10/16/2023 at 9:00 am PT, or as soon as more information becomes available

scheduled_maintenances.name: Japan SMS Carrier Maintenance - Rakuten Mobile

incident_updates.body: The Rakuten Mobile network in Japan is conducting a planned maintenance from 16 October 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 16 October 2023 at 13:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Rakuten Mobile Japan handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS and MMS Carrier Maintenance - AT&T

incident_updates.body:
The AT&T network in US is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 16 October 2023 at 08:00 PDT until 18 October 2023 at 03:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from AT&T US handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

16 October 2023 at 08:00 PDT until 17 October 2023 at 03:00 PDT
17 October 2023 at 08:00 PDT until 18 October 2023 at 03:00 PDT

incident_updates.body: The M1 network in Singapore is conducting a planned maintenance from 16 October 2023 at 11:00 PDT until 16 October 2023 at 14:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from M1 Singapore handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: UK SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance- O2 UK

incident_updates.body:
Our SMS carrier partner in UK is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 16 October 2023 at 15:00 PDT until 19 October 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from multiple network's UK handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:
16 October 2023 at 15:00 PDT until 16 October 2023 at 17:00 PDT.
17 October 2023 at 15:00 PDT until 17 October 2023 at 17:00 PDT.
19 October 2023 at 15:00 PDT until 19 October 2023 at 17:00 PDT.

The K-Cell network in Kazakhstan is conducting an emergency maintenance from 16 October 2023 at 16:00 PDT until 16 October 2023 at 19:00 PDT.During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to K-Cell Kazakhstan handsets.

The AT&T network in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 16 October at 19:00 PDT until 17 October at 03:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from AT&T US handsets.

The AT&T network in Mexico is conducting an emergency maintenance from 17 October 2023 at 03:00 PDT until 17 October 2023 at 07:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from AT&T Mexico handsets.

The DTAC network in Thailand is conducting a planned maintenance from 17 October 2023 at 10:00 PDT until 17 October 2023 at 11:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from DTAC Thailand handsets.

The AT&T network in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 17 October at 19:00 PDT until 18 October at 03:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from AT&T US handsets.

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in France is conducting a planned maintenance from 18 October 2023 at 20:00 PDT until 18 October 2023 at 21:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call failures to and from a subset of Twilio's France phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carrier Maintenance - Small US Networks

incident_updates.body: A subset of small networks in the US are conducting a planned maintenance from 18 October 2023 at 20:30 PDT until 19 October 2023 at 01:30 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from small US carrier networks.

During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Verizon network in the US when sending via shortcode.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Canada Account Security Service Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our service partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 October 2023 at 23:00 PDT until 25 October 2023 at 03:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for the following destination: Canada.
Impacted Products:
Verify Silent Network Auth
Lookup Identity Match
Lookup Line Type Intelligence [Twilio API]
Lookup SIM Swap
Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth

scheduled_maintenances.name: SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance - Multiple Countries

Tunisie Telecom Tunisia
Telmob Onatel Burkina Faso
Etisalat United Arab Emirates
